2025-11-02.title: Village of Grayslake — News & Civic Alerts
2025-11-02.description: Official village news, announcements, reminders and trending topics for Grayslake residents, including public notices and community updates. Use the Civic Alerts feed to find current items and event notices.

2025-11-02.title: Grayslake Central to Present 'Sideways Stories' Production
2025-11-02.description: Grayslake Central High School will be presenting a theatrical production of 'Sideways Stories' as part of their cultural programming. This event showcases student talent and creativity.

2025-11-02.title: Visit Lake County — Events Calendar
2025-11-02.description: County-wide events calendar listing festivals, seasonal exhibits, and cultural activities across Lake County. The calendar is updated regularly with upcoming events and visitor information.

2025-11-02.title: Medline Celebrates New Flagship Distribution Center in Grayslake
2025-11-02.description: Medline has opened a new flagship distribution center in Grayslake, enhancing local employment opportunities and supporting the community's economy.

2025-11-02.title: Grayslake Community Garden
2025-11-02.description: The Grayslake Community Garden is a local initiative aimed at promoting gardening and community involvement. Residents are encouraged to participate and grow their own plants in a supportive environment.

2025-11-02.title: Building Pathways: Grayslake D127's Summer Manufacturing Camps
2025-11-02.description: Grayslake D127 is hosting summer manufacturing camps aimed at empowering students and strengthening ties with the local industry. This initiative focuses on education and career readiness.

2025-11-02.title: Grayslake Chamber of Commerce — Events & Networking
2025-11-02.description: The Grayslake Chamber posts upcoming business networking, marketing and community involvement events that support local businesses and foster connections. See the chamber site for event listings and membership opportunities.

2025-11-02.title: Governor Pritzker announces Cache Energy expansion in Illinois
2025-11-02.description: State press release: Cache Energy plans an expansion that includes new manufacturing equipment and an on-site production line, emphasizing use of Illinois-based vendors and boosting local workforce opportunities. The announcement highlights state support for manufacturing growth in the region.

2025-11-02.title: SWALCO — Shoes, Shred & Seeds community collection (Wauconda partnership)
2025-11-02.description: The Solid Waste Agency of Lake County (SWALCO) partners with local municipalities like Wauconda to run community collection events offering shoe recycling, confidential paper shredding and seeds/plant giveaways. Check SWALCO for current schedules and locations.

2025-11-02.title: Central Range Development Project (Grayslake)
2025-11-02.description: Village information on the Central Range development area describing proposed development activity in Grayslake and projected long-term fiscal impacts, including an estimated property tax surplus. Ongoing planning and development updates are posted by the village.

2025-11-02.title: College of Lake County — News, Events & Advanced Technology Center
2025-11-02.description: CLC publishes ongoing campus news and community event listings and operates the Advanced Technology Center in Gurnee, which provides manufacturing workforce training and industry programs for Lake County residents. Check CLC for class schedules and upcoming public events.

2025-11-02.title: Grayslake Community Grant Program
2025-11-02.description: Village-run program offering public support and grants to nonprofit organizations serving Grayslake to fund community projects and local events. Information and application details are posted on the village site.

2025-11-02.title: Lake County Forest Preserves — Programs & Recreation Events
2025-11-02.description: The Lake County Forest Preserves host recurring nature programs, guided walks, seasonal festivals and recreation events across local preserves; schedules and registrations are posted on the preserves site.

2025-11-02.title: Kristof's Entertainment Center — Ongoing Attractions & Special Events
2025-11-02.description: Kristof's in Round Lake Beach is a family entertainment complex offering go-karts, bowling, mini golf, arcades and regular special events or group packages. The venue lists current promotions and event nights on its site.
